1 GAWLP Documentation - Registration Form
1.1 How to create a Landing Page that contains the Registration Form
Paste the following code into the page: {code} #** * Join Curriki Page * @programming *# #includeMacros("Registration.FormMacros") #tryregister() #if(!$result) ##{ #registrationinit('register') #registrationinfo() #startregistrationform() #registrationaccountinfo() #registrationprivacysettings() #registrationinterests() #registrationterms() #endregistrationform() #else ##}{ Registration succeeded -- go to email sent page $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL('Registration.EmailSent')) #end ##} {code}
To turn off non-required sections of the page, insert pound-pound-space at the beginning of the line OR delete the line (pound-pound-space will allow you to remember what you removed rather than having to return to the documentation page when you need to update it).
The non-required sections that can be removed/hidden include: {code} #registrationinfo() #registrationprivacysettings() #registrationinterests() {code}
You can add any additional content/styling before or after the registration form code. The registration form will ALWAYS take the global styles as seen on the [Join page|https://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/JoinCurriki].
NOTE: only Adwords buttons will submit information to the logs. The registration form will not show up in the adwords logs.
